segments.text: I want to make dinner tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you thinking of making ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't have any idea what to cook .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about making a teriyaki bowl ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me how to make it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All it consists of is teriyaki beef and white rice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , but what do I have to do to prepare it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All you have to do is cook some white rice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do I do after that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then cut up the beef and marinate it in teriyaki sauce .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What else do I have to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All that's left is to cook it .
segments.speaker: S2
